name: Zoho Inventory Login
description: Automated login process for Zoho Inventory through Google search

steps.name: Search for Zoho Inventory
steps.ai_instruction: Search for 'zoho inventory' in the search box

steps.name: Click Zoho Inventory link
steps.ai_instruction: Click on the Zoho Inventory official website link in search results

steps.name: Click Sign In
steps.ai_instruction: Click the Sign In button on Zoho Inventory homepage

steps.name: Enter email
steps.ai_instruction: Enter email address in the email field

steps.name: Click Next
steps.ai_instruction: Click the Next button after entering email

steps.name: Enter password
steps.ai_instruction: Enter password in the password field

steps.name: Click Sign In to complete login
steps.ai_instruction: Click the Sign In button to complete the login process
